Text:
Thank you eztv! I have been trying to register for months now so I can leave comments, and finally was able to today.
I say we each donate at least $20 to eztv, for uploading so many great torrents. I cant imagine how much time he must spend. I think $20 is not much considering all the torrents he provides us with:)
Just a thought.....

Did you donate 20 bucks to eztv vixen?
If you didn't, I'll donate my foot in your ass (Red Foreman)
